title: Microlearning Orientation for Online/Hybrid Course Preparation

context.prior_knowledge: No prior experience with online learning systems
context.additional_context: Aims to enhance adaptability to online/hybrid learning environments for science-related vocational training

learning_goals: Learners can utilize basic functions of online learning systems (LMS) with 90% accuracy
Learners can use real-time collaboration tools (video conferencing, live chat) with 80% efficiency during hybrid classes
Learners can self-directively complete mobile microlearning content (5-minute videos, quizzes) at an 85% completion rate
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
